title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 130.3 - Other requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 130.3 - Other requirements

State Regulations

Any heir or creditor must also provide any and all documents
required by the Office of Unclaimed Funds which are necessary to prove the
decedent's identity and entitlement to the funds, or are otherwise necessary in
order for the Office of Unclaimed Funds to meet all of its statutory
obligations or approve the claim. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
130.3

Adopted, New

York State Register September 3, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 35, eff. 9/3/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
